short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An all-in-one localStorage/sessionStorage/cookie manager browser extension for Chrome/Edge/Firefox browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supported features:
Share - Transfer Application storage/session across tabs
Explorer - Read/add/update/delete the contents of Application storage items

This extension does NOT track or share user data with others, nor does it store the same for itself. So, it's safe to use
